snippet: The United States blacklisted several organizations in Iran on Wednesday, widening the American effort to pressure the government over its nuclear program and human rights abuses.
abstract: United States and Europe widen efforts to pressure Iran's government over its nuclear program and human rights abuses; impose new set of sanctions intended to force Iran into what amounts to barter trade for oil, because payments for oil deliveries can no longer be sent to accounts inside Iran.

byline.original: By THOMAS ERDBRINK and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: The United States blacklisted several organizations in Iran on Wednesday, widening the American effort to pressure the government over its nuclear program and human rights abuses.

headline.main: U.S. Increases Pressure of Economic War on Tehran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Ratchets Up An Economic War Against Tehran

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
